INSERT INTO `device_point_list_map`( id_device_list, id_point_list, name, low_alarm, high_alarm ) SELECT device_list.id, point_list.id AS id_point_list, point_list.name AS name, point_list.low_alarm AS low_alarm, point_list.high_alarm AS high_alarm
FROM device_list INNER JOIN template_library ON template_library.id=device_list.id_template INNER JOIN point_list ON template_library.id=point_list.id_template WHERE device_list.id= ${id} ORDER BY point_list.id ASC;
